tool_material.coating_recommendation: Uncoated polished. DLC for high-Si. PCD for production.
tool_material.geometry_recommendation: Very sharp edge, high positive rake 15-20°, polished flutes, large chip gullet

coolant.recommendation: Flood for roughing. MQL or dry possible for finishing. Avoid chlorinated fluids.
